none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 03, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
More dreary proto-goth please. Early UK synth drenched dark wave from Ireland circa 2016, HARD BODIES leave us with a scant four tracks...perhaps they stopped there as a symbolic mic drop to imply that perfection had been achieved, or perhaps they got too depressed to write more after the dreadful monotony of "Getaway" and decided to actually get away. As is often the case when something hits me this hard right from the start, I am not nearly as concerned with how or why HARD BODIES created these sounds, I'm just grateful that they did.  HARD BODIES
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9n1Ks2SAQAI/XW4Ig6VVZXI/AAAAAAAAVyw/JN6znhZnfz4h85SaXLl5MuTCxGjq17T2wCEwYBhgL/s1600/Hard%2BBodies%2Bimg%2Bcopy.jpg

seo.title: Hard Bodies - Hard Bodies cassette - Terminal Escape
